title: Intermediate Bots Bug
body:
Alright so, something me and a few friends noticed yesterday is that one bot for some reason will not leave spawn, even when our entire team was there from the start. Originally, we thought it was because someone took smite and/or was in the jungle. However, I just played a bot game and none of us had smite nor did anyone start in the jungle.

Here's a screenshot from 9 minutes into the game, when I noticed the one bot wasn't there. As you can tell, everyone but the Volibear bot has items, so he hadn't left spawn at all.

https://i.gyazo.com/6164cfdd8a78630327908a66b91737bf.jpg

Happens in both beginner and intermediate summoners rift bot games.
